column4: i'm getting error message '1 of your harddisks is failing' ... I'm in the process of moving my data over to my 2nd drive.  once done what should I do to test/possibly repair the first drive?
thowland : I probably will trash it ... it's only got like 2 years uptime and i think seagate has a 3 or 5 yr. warranty ... thanks for the tip
